Text.val: generates .CSV file with information for uploaded schedules/invoices and returns
Note: We do not check for specific permissions here. If the IFIL_ID is correct
for this session, the client user is allowed to see the information we do output
generate CSV and write to tempfile ...
delete CSV fiel, its no longer needed
csv header line with column headers ....

ExpSyntax.val: 'Administration number;Client number;Schedule number;Client debtornumber;Invoice number;Invoice date;Invoice amount;Invoice currency;Payment days;Due date'
